Package com.tangosol.coherence.jcache.remotecache

Class RemoteCacheConfiguration<K,​V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tangosol.coherence.jcache.AbstractCoherenceBasedCompleteConfiguration<K,​V>
      • com.tangosol.coherence.jcache.remotecache.RemoteCacheConfiguration<K,​V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of keys
    V - the type of values
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoherenceBasedCompleteConfiguration<K,​V>, CoherenceBasedConfiguration<K,​V>, ExternalizableLite, PortableObject, Serializable, javax.cache.configuration.CompleteConfiguration<K,​V>, javax.cache.configuration.Configuration<K,​V>
    public class RemoteCacheConfiguration<K,​V>
extends AbstractCoherenceBasedCompleteConfiguration<K,​V>
    A Configuration for a Cache based on a Coherence <remote-scheme>, or more specifically a NamedCache.
    Since:
    Coherence 12.2.1
    Author:
    jf 2014.05.22

      • createCache

        public CoherenceBasedCache<K,​V> createCache​(CoherenceBasedCacheManager manager,
                                                  String sJCacheName)
                                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: CoherenceBasedConfiguration
        Creates a CoherenceBasedCache based on the current state of the CoherenceBasedConfiguration, to be owned by the specified CoherenceBasedCacheManager.
        Parameters:
        manager - the owning CoherenceBasedCacheManager
        sJCacheName - the name of the Cache to be configured
        Returns:
        a CoherenceBasedCache
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when a Cache can't be created based on the current CoherenceBasedConfiguration
